description: This bright purple smoothie is a colourful and nutritious start to the day.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Pear,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free,Beetroot
name: Blueberry & Beetroot Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium pears, peeled, cored and chopped
2 tbs ginger, fresh, peeled and grated

recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the ingredients to a high powered blender and blitz until completely smooth, adding water as necessary.
